about_the_game: This DLC removes the mosaics from the x-rated and sex scenes of OPPAI Succubus Academy Sucky and Busty, Demonic and Lusty!.

content_descriptors.notes:
You must be over 18 to play this game.
This game is an erotic visual novel for adults only whose contents are not appropriate for all ages, and are not appropriate for viewing at work because contains explicit and graphic sexual contents and scenes that some users may find sensitive and/or offensive. 
It contains frequent nudity and revealing outfits, explicit references to sex or sexuality and BDSM, sexual scenes and stories, dialogue and situations involving suggestive, mature and adult themes and humor, fondling, kiss, adult humor, bathroom humor and situations.
In the game there are explicit and graphic depictions and descriptions of sexual acts (oral, vaginal, anal penetrative and non-penetrative acts) in a wide range of situations including: costume sex play, sex toys,  mammary intercourse, sexual intercourse with pregnant characters, sexual intercourse with succubus, demon, ogre (and other fantasy demi-humans characters), threesomes (main character with heroine character and her mother), group orgies (one male with several female characters), sexual fetishism, piss play, lactating breast, male and female ejaculations, food play, spanking, S&M, erotic humiliation and sexual abuse.
There are scenes which explicitly depict sexual violence and non consensual intercourse between the characters of the game.
Reference to profanity and frequent use of explicit and bad language, kink-shaming.
All of the characters in this game are over 18 years old.
